text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
...Why are you here...?

Good work.  
I thought it would be ending soon.

Oh, is that so...?  
Did you think I wouldn't come to practice anymore?

────
I'll go to practice.

If you're useless and can't dance, and not coming
to practice is bothering everyone, then I won't go...

...Can I turn off the music? I don't like this unit,
which only has being friendly as its selling point.

...Yeah, I admit I'm not good at singing and dancing.  
I can't be like SHHis.
...Or rather than SHHis
It's impossible for me to be like Mikoto-san, isn't it?

Oh, even though my level isn't much different  
I said the worst thing...

............
This makes it clear, doesn't it...

It was all thanks to Mikoto-san  
It was all because I was clinging to Mikoto-san

............
Since I'm not showing up anyway, in everyone's eyes...
In Mikoto-san's eyes...

Because of SHHis...  Because I'm with Mikoto-san,
that's the only reason I'm being seen
Nichika

Mikoto isn't dancing alone...  
...If Mikoto were dancing alone──
Someone would have to be with her──
